title: Ivanti Avalanche getCountMuStatDevicePropResultsFromMuListAgentIds SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Avalanche. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the getCountMuStatDevicePropResultsFromMuListAgentIds function. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-Ivanti-Avalanche-CVE-2025-8296-CVE-2025-8297?language=en_US
timeline:
2025-06-19 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-08-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-08-20 - Advisory Updated
